mapper.select: select id, title, description, ImageFile, ImageUrl, LinkUrl, Target, UseYn, DATE_FORMAT(CreatedAt, '%y.%m.%d') CreatedAt, DATE_FORMAT(UpdatedAt, '%Y.%m.%d') UpdatedAt from faq where UseYn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into faq (Title, description, ImageFile, ImageUrl, LinkUrl, Target) values(#{title}, #{description}, #{ImageFile}, #{ImageUrl}, #{LinkUrl}, #{Target}));
mapper.update: update faq set UseYn = 'N' where id = #{id}
